mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_board (title, contents, writer_id, registration_date) VALUES (#{title}, #{contents}, #{writerId}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT board_id, title, contents, writer_id, U.name AS writer_name, registration_date FROM tb_board B LEFT JOIN tb_user U ON (B.writer_id = U.user_id) WHERE B.used = 'Y';
SELECT board_id, title, contents, writer_id, U.name AS writer_name, registration_date FROM tb_board B LEFT JOIN tb_user U ON (B.writer_id = U.user_id) WHERE B.board_id = #{boardId};
